Install calc102------------->
    npm i calc102

Require calc102------------->
    const calc = require("calc102");

add(val1,val2)-->
    sum two arguments.
    let res=calc.add(val1,val2);    

sub(val1,val2)-->
    substract two arguments.
    let res=calc.sub(val1,val2);    

mult(val1,val2)-->
    multiply two arguments.
    let res=calc.mult(val1,val2);    

div(val1,val2)-->
    divide two arguments.
    let res=calc.div(val1,val2);
